page.title: 09THAMES VALLEY POLICE
page.content: The Thames Valley Police Headquarters is in Kidlington.It coves about five acres and employs about 250 people.It was built in 1965 when 5 police forces joined together making the sixth biggest police force in England.The forces which amalgamated were Berkshire,Buckinghamshire,Oxfordshire, Oxford City and Reading Borough.Allthe administration for the Thames Valley force is done here.There is a very tall radio mast near the middle of the headquarters.This enables all the forces'cars to keep in radio contact with Kidlington wherever they are.
